entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @VICENews Each day we become more of a fascist society that undermines democracy!  @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse want to control the #COVID19 narrative - put in the hands of politicians not scientists - so they can win the #MAGA election with propaganda targeting weak minds. Nazi Playbook!
